text: İpek University () was a private university in Çankaya, the central district of Ankara, Turkey. Established in 2011, the university was one out of fifteen private universities that were closed by the Turkish government in the course of the 2016 Turkish purges. ==References== * ==External links== * Category:Private universities and colleges in Turkey Category:Universities and colleges in Ankara Category:Educational institutions established in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in Turkey Category:Educational institutions shut down in the 2016 Turkish purges Category:Defunct universities and colleges in Turkey
title: İpek University
